de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.senv.core

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.senv.core.Edge

  • public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an edge in the graph. An edge is defined through the two vertices it connects.
    Author:
    Mario Hegele, Illya Stepanov

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Edge(java.lang.String v1_id, java.lang.String v2_id)
      Creates a new edge with a connection between two vertices.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Edge

        public Edge(java.lang.String v1_id,
            java.lang.String v2_id)
        Creates a new edge with a connection between two vertices.
        The vertex IDs are ordered ascendantly.
        The IDs must be different and of type int.
        Parameters:
        v1_id - the first vertex ID
        v2_id - the second vertex ID
